reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater to be of high quality with soft wool blend material that's not itchy at all. Customers like the wide variety of colors available and find it has the right weight for fall, being neither too thin nor too heavy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and nice sweater
items.body: This sweater is so soft, fits perfectly, and the wool-blend material feels high-quality. It’s warm, comfortable, and looks nice. I will be buying more in different colors. Read more
items.author: Bella

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with the purchase
items.body: Great sweater! I wore it every day when I was traveling to keep warm. It worked great and kept me warm. Very versatile and goes with everything! Light weight but nice quality. Very comfortable and no need to feel precious about it. Looks nice but didn’t cost a fortune. Love it! I don’t hesitate to wear it! Read more
items.author: Verified buyer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft!!!
items.body: Beautiful sweater! I am 5’4 1/2”, 36D, usually wear size 6 Jean, and small or medium top (closure to the medium) this size small fits perfectly. Sleeve length is perfect. Great quality and good price. This I will purchase in additional colors. Read more
items.author: GingerS

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality
items.body: Camel color is more of a cool light brown. Sweater is very nice, super soft, fit is good, and the color is nice. It looks more "camel" colored on screen than it does in person. The quality is much nicer than most of the Amazon clothing products that I generally buy. It drapes well and doesn't look or feel bulky. I got an XL, and I am 5'6" 140 lbs. It is quite long on my frame but the sleeve length is perfect. Read more
items.author: Arcy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality classic style sweater
items.body: This sweater is very comfortable and soft. I did not feel any itching of skin and it looks great! I bought a medium size although the Sizing chart had me buying an XL. No way, I pretty much always wear a medium unless the sizes run smaller than usual. I give it 5 stars for the following reasons: quality, color, and style. I've seen some complain about the pilling and the high cost and here's what I have found. If you have ever shopped at WHBM or other retailers that sell similar clothing, you will pay nearly $100 for a sweater like this and will not last at all! It will pill and look horrible after the first wash. Not this sweater, I think the price is a bargain given the quality even though it pilled under my arms. That's easily fixable with a fabric shaver. The colors (I bought black, blue and red) are just like the color I see on my phone so I am happy about that. Read more
items.author: Cactus Flower

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater but sleeves short
items.body: So soft - not too thick and not too thin. Love the coffee color. My most typical size is a large and it fit well, not too tight or too loose. However, the sleeves were about an inch too short for me so I sized up one so the sleeves didn’t hit at an awkward length. Perfect for the office with dress pants or jeans! Read more
items.author: Leah Shannon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softest for sweater weather.
items.body: Very nice sweater. Comfortable and warm and cozy. I order another a size down and it fits perfect. I like both sizes for different looks. Washes beautifully and hang dried. Read more
items.author: DD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just received and it seems well made
items.body: Seems like good quality . Ive only worn one time but it seems like this will hold up well and continue looking nice. Many sweaters I've bought in Amazon look nice until worn a couple times. Its lighter in fabric weight but still has a nice warmth to it for winter. Works great with a vest if extra cold. Not bulky or itchy - comfortable fabric. Read more
items.author: S.

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-light Blue, Cable-white, Fair Isle-dark Green, Cable-yellow, Cable-caramel, A-apricot, Cable-coffee, A-green Tea, A-maple-leaf Red, A-grass Green, A-bluish Green, A-apricot02, A-camel02, A-dark Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
